title: Inquire About Annuity Withdrawal
description: An annuity contract holder wants to know how much they can withdraw and what the tax implications would be.

tasks.description: Identify the contract holder and their annuity details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and their specific annuity contract.

tasks.description: Determine the surrender charge period and calculate the penalty-free withdrawal amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the customer can withdraw up to 10% of the contract value without a surrender charge.

tasks.description: Explain the tax implications, specifically that earnings are taxed as ordinary income.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the tax rules for a non-qualified annuity withdrawal.
